page.title: 16HOMELIFE - KNOWLE
page.content: The average{family}has three children. Most families have domestic {pets;}the most popular being the dog, but goldfish, birds, and guinea pigs closely follow. {Household chores}can be family events such as:- Washing clothes, ironing, sewing, vacuuming, polishing, tidying rooms, cooking and shopping. The majority of jobs are done by women, but children often help by doing errands such as washing dishes and making their beds. The time of the{main meal}varies, just after midday or early evening being popular choices. Some children help in the preparation of the meal by peeling potatoes, chopping vegetables or setting the table. A favourite meal could consist of chips, meat, beans and for dessert perhaps trifle, fruitpie, crumble or cheesecake.
